00035 /*  No constructor and destructor, because this class only contains static methods.
00036         It won't be instantiated. */

00038 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::strings ID){
00039     switch ( ID ){
00040         case bibletimeVersion:          return "bibletimeVersion";
00041         case language:                          return "language";
00042         case standardBible:                 return "standardBible";
00043         case standardCommentary:        return "standardCommentary";
00044         case standardLexicon:           return "standardLexicon";
00045         case standardHebrewStrongsLexicon:  return "standardHebrewLexicon";
00046         case standardGreekStrongsLexicon:   return "standardGreekLexicon";
00047         case standardHebrewMorphLexicon:    return "standardHebrewMorphLexicon";
00048         case standardGreekMorphLexicon:     return "standardGreekMorphLexicon";
00049     }
00050     return QString::null;
00051 }
00052 
00053 const QString CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::strings ID){
00054     switch ( ID ){
00055         case bibletimeVersion:          return ( "NOT YET INSTALLED" );
00056             // main() will realize this and set the value to VERSION
00057         case language:                          return (KGlobal::locale()->language()).local8Bit();
00058         case standardBible:                 return "KJV";  // no effect
00059         case standardCommentary:        return "MHC";
00060         case standardLexicon:           return "Eastons";
00061         case standardHebrewStrongsLexicon: return "StrongsHebrew";
00062         case standardGreekStrongsLexicon:   return "StrongsGreek";
00063         case standardHebrewMorphLexicon:    return "StrongsHebrew"; //warning this is wrong
00064         case standardGreekMorphLexicon:     return "StrongsGreek";  //but imo has no effect
00065     }
00066     return QString::null;
00067 }
00068 
00069 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::fonts ID){
00070     switch ( ID ){
00071         case standard:  return "standard";
00072         case unicode:   return "unicode";
00073     }
00074     return QString::null;   
00075 }

00077 const QFont CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::fonts ID){
00078     switch ( ID ){
00079         case standard:  return QApplication::font();
00080         case unicode: //find an Unicode font
00081         {   
00082 //          KCharsets* cs = KGlobal::charsets();

00086 //              qWarning("NO UNICODE FONT INSTALLED!");
00087 //          }           
00088 //          cs->setQFont(uniFont, QFont::Unicode);
00090 //          
00131 //          
00141 #warning reimplement -> maybe using QFontDatabase::script ?
00142             return QApplication::font();
00143         }
00144         
00145     }
00146     return QString::null;   
00147 }

00149 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::bools ID){
00150     switch ( ID ){
00151         case firstSearchDialog:     return "firstSearchDialog";
00152         case readOldBookmarks:      return "readOldBookmarks";
00153 
00154         case toolbar:                           return "toolbar";
00155         case mainIndex:                     return "mainIndex";
00156 
00157         case autoTile:                      return "autoTile";
00158         case autoCascade:                   return "autoCascade";
00159 
00160         case lexiconCache:              return "lexicon_chache";
00161 
00162         case footnotes:                     return "footnotes";
00163         case strongNumbers:             return "strongNumbers";
00164     case headings:                      return "headings";
00165     case morphTags:                     return "morphTags";
00166         case lemmas:                            return "lemmas";
00167         case hebrewPoints:              return "hebrewPoints";
00168         case hebrewCantillation:    return "hebrewCantillation";
00169         case greekAccents:              return "greekAccents";
00170         case textualVariants:           return "textualVariants";       
00171 
00172         case lineBreaks:                    return "lineBreaks";
00173         case verseNumbers:              return "verseNumbers";
00174         case scroll:                            return "scroll";
00175 
00176         case tips:                              return "RunOnStart";
00177         case logo:                              return "logo";
00178         case restoreWorkspace:      return "restoreWorkspace";
00179     }
00180     return QString::null;   
00181 }

00183 const bool CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::bools ID){
00184     switch ( ID ){
00185         case firstSearchDialog:     return true;
00186     case readOldBookmarks:    return false;
00187 
00188         case toolbar:                           return true;
00189         case mainIndex:                     return true;
00190 
00191         case autoTile:                      return true;
00192         case autoCascade:                   return false;
00193 
00194         case lexiconCache:              return true;
00195 
00196         case footnotes:                     return true;
00197         case strongNumbers:             return false;
00198     case headings:                      return true;
00199     case morphTags:                     return false;
00200         case lemmas:                            return false;
00201         case hebrewPoints:              return false;
00202         case hebrewCantillation:    return false;
00203         case greekAccents:              return false;
00204         case textualVariants:           return false;
00205 
00206         case lineBreaks:                    return true;
00207         case verseNumbers:              return true;
00208         case scroll:                            return true;
00209 
00210         case tips:                              return true;
00211         case logo:                              return true;
00212         case restoreWorkspace:      return false;
00213     }
00214     return false;
00215 }

00217 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::colors ID){
00218     switch ( ID ){
00219         case textColor:                             return "textColor";
00220         case backgroundColor:               return "backgroundColor";
00221         case background2Color:              return "background2Color";
00222         case highlightedVerseColor:     return "highlightedVerseClolor";
00223         case footnotesColor:                    return "footnotesColor";
00224         case strongsColor:                      return "strongsColor";
00225         case morphsColor:                       return "morphsColor";
00226         case jesuswordsColor:               return "jesuswordsColor";
00227         case swordRefColor:                     return "swordRefColor";
00228     }
00229     return QString::null;
00230 }

00232 const QColor CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::colors ID){
00233     switch ( ID ){
00234         case textColor:                             return QColor(Qt::black);
00235         case backgroundColor:               return QColor(Qt::white);
00236         case background2Color:              return QColor(QString("#f1f1f1"));
00237         case highlightedVerseColor:     return QColor(Qt::red);
00238         case footnotesColor:                    return QColor(Qt::black);
00239         case strongsColor:                      return QColor(Qt::green);
00240         case morphsColor:                       return QColor(Qt::green);
00241         case jesuswordsColor:               return QColor(Qt::red);
00242         case swordRefColor:                     return QColor(Qt::blue);
00243     }
00244     return Qt::blue;
00245 }

00261 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::stringLists ID){
00262     switch ( ID ){
00263         case searchCompletionTexts: return QString::fromLatin1("searchCompletionTexts");
00264         case searchTexts: return QString::fromLatin1("searchTexts");
00265     }
00266     return QString::null;

00269 const QStringList CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::stringLists ID){
00270     switch ( ID ){
00271         case searchTexts:
00272             return QStringList();
00273         case searchCompletionTexts:
00274             return QStringList();
00275     }
00276     return QStringList();

00279 const QString CBTConfig::get( const CBTConfig::strings ID){
00280     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00281     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "strings");
00282     return config->readEntry(getKey(ID),getDefault(ID));
00283 }
00284 
00285 const QFont CBTConfig::get(const CBTConfig::fonts ID){
00286     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00287     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "fonts");
00288     QFont defaultFont = getDefault(ID);
00289     return config->readFontEntry(getKey(ID), &defaultFont);
00290 }
00291 
00292 const bool CBTConfig::get( const CBTConfig::bools ID){
00293     //special behaviour for the KTipDialog class
00294     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();    
00295     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, (ID == CBTConfig::tips) ? "TipOfDay" : "bools");       
00296     return config->readBoolEntry(getKey(ID),getDefault(ID));
00297 }
00298

00300     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00301     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "colors");
00302     QColor defaultColor = getDefault(ID);
00303     return config->readColorEntry(getKey(ID),&defaultColor);
00304 }

00309     return config->readIntListEntry(getKey(ID));

00318 void CBTConfig::set( const CBTConfig::strings ID, const QString value ){
00319     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00320     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "strings");
00321     config->writeEntry(getKey(ID), value);
00322 }

00330 void CBTConfig::set(const  CBTConfig::bools ID,const  bool value ){
00331     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00332     //special behaviour to work with KTipDialog class of KDE
00333     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, (ID == CBTConfig::tips) ? "TipOfDay" : "bools");
00334     config->writeEntry(getKey(ID), value);
00335 }

00357 const CSwordBackend::DisplayOptionsBool CBTConfig::getDisplayOptionDefaults(){
00358   CSwordBackend::DisplayOptionsBool options;
00359 
00360     options.lineBreaks =        get(CBTConfig::lineBreaks);
00361   options.verseNumbers =    get(CBTConfig::verseNumbers);
00362 
00363     return options;
00364 }

00366 const CSwordBackend::FilterOptionsBool CBTConfig::getFilterOptionDefaults(){
00367 
00368   CSwordBackend::FilterOptionsBool options;
00369 
00370   options.footnotes =                       get(CBTConfig::footnotes);
00371   options.strongNumbers =           get(CBTConfig::strongNumbers);
00372   options.headings =                        get(CBTConfig::headings);
00373   options.morphTags =                   get(CBTConfig::morphTags);
00374   options.lemmas =                          get(CBTConfig::lemmas);
00375   options.hebrewPoints =                get(CBTConfig::hebrewPoints);
00376   options.hebrewCantillation =  get(CBTConfig::hebrewCantillation);
00377   options.greekAccents =                get(CBTConfig::greekAccents);
00378 
00379     return options;
00380 }
00381 
00382 void CBTConfig::setupAccel(const CBTConfig::keys type, KAccel* const accel) {
00383     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();    
00384     
00385     switch (type) {
00386         case readWindow : {
00387             accel->setConfigGroup("Readwindow shortcuts");      
00388             break;
00389         };
00390         case bookWindow : {
00391             accel->setConfigGroup("Book shortcuts");        
00392             break;
00393         };
00394         case bibleWindow : {
00395             accel->setConfigGroup("Bible shortcuts");
00396             break;
00397         };
00398         case commentaryWindow : {
00399             accel->setConfigGroup("Commentary shortcuts");              
00400             break;      
00401         };
00402         case lexiconWindow : {
00403             accel->setConfigGroup("Lexicon shortcuts");                 
00404             break;
00405         };
00406         case application : {
00407             accel->setConfigGroup("Application shortcuts");             
00408             break;
00409         };
00410     };
00411 }
